title: Memorial service set for OSU video coordinator Naple
content:
A memorial service is scheduled for Oklahoma State football video coordinator Jeff "Pitt" Naple.

The service will be at 10:30 a.m. Thursday at Sunnybrook Christian Church in Stillwater.

The 54-year-old Naple died Sunday due to cancer.

Naple worked at OSU for more than 25 years after graduating in the 1980s. He shot and edited practice and game video for football coaches Pat Jones, Bob Simmons, Les Miles and Mike Gundy and worked in the basketball program for coaches Eddie Sutton and Sean Sutton and the baseball program for coaches Gary Ward and Tom Holliday.

He's survived by his wife, Bonnie, and son Nick.
